remarks: Property defining a linear functional.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ellnfn $p |- ( T e. LinFn <-> ( T : ~H --> CC /\ A. x e. CC A. y e. ~H A. z e. ~H ( T ` ( ( x .h y ) +h z ) ) = ( ( x x. ( T ` y ) ) + ( T ` z ) ) ) ) $.
$d T x y z $.
